title: DSType releases Apud and Apud Display
content:
We are proud to announce the release of Apud and Apud Display.

Apud

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818225818im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSType_Apud_5221.jpg)

Apud Display

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818225818im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSType_ApudDisplay_5633.jpg)

Best,  
Dino dos Santos  
 [www.dstype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818225818/http:/www.dstype.com/ "www.dstype.com")
author: dstype

comments.content: These are really great typefaces. Really like the italic e and k.

Congrats!!

I really like the "k" italic :)

Regards

Excellent work, Dino!

Keep it up!

Your types are fantastic.
